values.QuestionText: What is something you do that you are way too old to still be doing? Are you embarrassed about it ?
What is something you have bought that was a waste of money?
What do you think disappoints your parents most about you?
Which part of your body would you make bigger and which part of your body would you make smaller ?
What is something your family did that you thought was normal but you now realise is weird
Other than romantic partners, how many people have you seen naked as an adult!? What were the circumstances?
What is something that you have always wanted to ask about the opposite gender?
Using three adjectives describe how you lost your virginity...? Now explain why these are relevant to your experience
If you could bring an inanimate object to life what would it be and why?
What messed up thing do you think about but could never actually do?
Describe yourself as if you were auditioning for a dating show. Make your audition as honest and cheesy as you can!
What conspiracy theory do you most strongly believe in? The Yaks are listening
Which player has the most disgusting habit? Each player must have a different answer
If you could give another player a ridiculous tattoo, who would it be and what would you give them ?
What was your opinion of each player when you first met them? How has it changed?
Which player is the biggest liar? What is one of the worst lies you have heard them tell?
